name: Knight Helper
description:
It's a small puzzle game made during the Bored Pixels Jam 8 (the theme: "You Are Not the Hero") where you have to help the knight to get at the door with items. The game is short with only 5 levels.

Controls

Drag & Drop items on the hotbar with the mouse to make them spawn in the world. Then press the "Run" button to simulate the game.

Credits

Made by Guthen & Rin Kaoru. CC-29 colors palette.
